PropertyList.title: MFI-9B
PropertyList.text:
____________________Limitations____________________ Speeds Max level speed at S/L : 130 kts Design diving speed : 165 kts Max cruising speed : 127 kts Econ. cruising speed : 113 kts Recommended approach speed : 70 kts Stalling speed, power off : 43 kts
Service Ceiling : 15,000 ft
MTOW utility cat.: 1,268 lbs MTOW normal cat.: 1,325 lbs
______________FlightGear Pilot's Notes_____________
http://wiki.flightgear.org/index.php/MFI-9
